title: GM Stock Is Rising After Third-Quarter Earnings Weather the Strike
text:
General Motors reported third-quarter earnings Tuesday morning that were pretty good. The company earned $1.72 a share, excluding a $1 billion strike impact, better than the $1.38 Wall Street expected and not too far off the $1.87 a share earned in the third quarter of 2018. GM shares are up almost 2.2% in premarket trading.

“Our new labor agreement maintains our competitiveness, preserves our operating flexibility and allows us to continue improving our quality and productivity,” CEO Mary Barra said in the company’s news...
description: The company earned $1.72 a share, excluding a $1 billion strike impact, better than the $1.38 Wall Street expected and not too far off the $1.87 a share earned in the third quarter of 2018.
